name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VocAdapt – Language Learning with Simplified Content

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Master any language—skip the boring stuff. VocAdapt adjusts content to your level so you naturally learn from content you love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Key Features

📚 Learn Languages through Understanding
🔹AI-powered technology adjusts any website to your language level.
🔹Targets optimal 90% comprehension for natural language learning.
🔹No more switching between translators and textbooks.

💡 Read without Translations
🔹Select any word or phrase for instant explanations in your target language.
🔹Build vocabulary naturally through authentic context.
🔹Master idioms and phrases in real-world situations.
🔹Create your personal vocabulary collection with progress tracking.
🔹Ideal for IELTS, TOEFL, and other exam preparations.

🔁 Reinforce New Vocabulary
🔹Smart algorithm seamlessly injects your vocabulary into adapted content.
🔹Advanced spaced repetition system boosts memorization without flashcards.
🔹Automatically reinforces challenging words based on your progress.
🔹Track your vocabulary growth with detailed statistics.
🔹Learn vocabulary in context, not in isolation.

🎥 Adapt Video Difficulty
🔹Transforms YouTube videos with AI voice cloning technology.
🔹Creates personalized content at your level while keeping original voices.
🔹Integrates your vocabulary into video content.
🔹Adjusts speech rate and clarity for better comprehension.
🔹Perfect for podcasts, tutorials, and online courses.
🔹Interactive subtitles for instant explanations (coming soon).

Perfect For:
✨ Language enthusiasts and polyglots tired of boring flashcards and textbooks.
✨ Learners at any proficiency level.
✨ Students preparing for language exams.
✨ Professionals needing language skills.
✨ Self-learners seeking natural immersion.
✨ Anyone wanting to achieve language fluency.

Supported Languages:
English, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Ukrainian, French, Polish, Portuguese, German, Turkish, Russian, and more!
